entities

Class EntityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.EntityManager

  • public class EntityManager
extends java.lang.Object
    entity manager stores all entities and components of entities ordered in hashmaps by component.class this is a singleton https://www.tutorialspoint.com/java/java_using_singleton.htm
